Function reference

Geocoding

These functions search an address or reference and return coordinates.

geo_address_lookup()
Address lookup API for OSM elements
geo_address_lookup_sf()
Address lookup API for OSM elements in sf format
geo_lite()
Address search API for OSM elements (free-form query)
geo_lite_sf()
Address search API for OSM elements in sf format (free-form query)

Reverse geocoding

These functions search coordinates and returns information of places on that coordinates.

reverse_geo_lite()
Reverse geocoding API for OSM elements
reverse_geo_lite_sf()
Reverse geocoding API for OSM elements in sf format

Get spatial objects

These functions return sf objects.

bbox_to_poly()
Coerce a bounding box to a sfc POLYGON object
geo_address_lookup_sf()
Address lookup API for OSM elements in sf format
geo_lite_sf()
Address search API for OSM elements in sf format (free-form query)
reverse_geo_lite_sf()
Reverse geocoding API for OSM elements in sf format

About the package

nominatimlite nominatimlite-package
nominatimlite: Interface with 'Nominatim' API Service
